casebody.data:
James RATZA, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
AJE, LLC, d/b/a Kart 2 Kart, LLC, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 157755
COA: 342968 Supreme Court of Michigan. June 22, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellee to extend the time for filing its answer to the application for leave to appeal is GRANTED. The answer submitted on June 18, 2018, is accepted for filing.
